actionCalls.name: myRule_14_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Escalation Email To Store Manager

actionCalls.name: myRule_18_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Escalation Email to Store Director

actionCalls.name: myRule_22_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Escalation Email to District Manager

actionCalls.name: myRule_26_A2
actionCalls.label: Send Email to Executive Customer Relations

rules.name: myRule_12
rules.label: Is Case Sent Back to Store

rules.name: myRule_14
rules.label: Is Case escalated to Store Manager

rules.name: myRule_18
rules.label: Is Case escalated to Store Director (EN)

rules.name: myRule_22
rules.label: Is Case escalated to In Store District Manager EN

rules.name: myRule_26
rules.label: Is Case Assigned to Unresolved Cases Queue

Flow.description: Add KIT Status to Waiting on Store Action

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Case].Hidden_Case_Comment__c ), NOT([Case].Is_Comment_Sended__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL([Case].KIT_Status__c , 'Resolved') , ISPICKVAL([Case].KIT_Status__c , 'Waiting on Customer') ) )

AND( ISCHANGED([Case].KIT_Status__c ) , ISPICKVAL([Case].KIT_Status__c , 'Waiting on Store'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( [Case].KIT_Status__c ) , 'Waiting on Support' ), NOT(ISBLANK([Case].District_Manager_Email__c ) ) , NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Store__c )) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.KIT_Status__c} ) , ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.KIT_Status__c} , 'Waiting on Store'), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( {!myVariable_current.KIT_Status__c} ) , 'Waiting on Support' ), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.District_Manager_Email__c} ) ) , NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Store__c} )) )

Flow.label: Case Process

recordUpdates.name: myRule_3_A1
recordUpdates.label: Fill New store data if Store not Null
